name: Thomas & Friends Battery-Powered Train Set
description: This battery-powered train and track set includes Thomas and Friends characters - Thomas, Vinç Crane, and Otoray Sandy. Children can use Vinç Crane's hook to load and unload cargo from Thomas's freight car. Otoray Sandy accompanies Vinç Crane in their adventures on this fun track set. You can connect this set to other Thomas & Friends track sets (except wooden ones) for endless adventure options (other track sets sold separately). Suitable for preschoolers aged 3 and above.

attributes.value: Battery-Powered, Cargo Loading, Multiple Adventure Options
1 motorized Thomas locomotive, Vinç Crane, Otoray Sandy, 8 track pieces
